name: Elden Ring
description: An open-world action RPG developed by FromSoftware, featuring challenging combat, deep lore, and vast exploration with horseback travel and dungeons.

name: Dark Souls III
description: The final entry in the Dark Souls trilogy, known for its brutal difficulty, atmospheric world, and rewarding combat mechanics.

name: Bloodborne
description: A gothic horror-inspired action RPG with fast-paced combat, Lovecraftian themes, and an intricate interconnected world.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: A samurai-inspired action game with a unique parry-based combat system, stealth mechanics, and a deep story set in feudal Japan.

name: Satisfactory
description: A first-person factory-building game where players automate production lines on an alien planet while exploring and managing resources.

name: Factorio
description: A 2D factory-building game that challenges players to design complex automated systems while defending against alien creatures.

name: Dyson Sphere Program
description: A sci-fi factory-building game where players construct a Dyson Sphere to harness the power of a star, managing resources across a galactic scale.

name: Cities: Skylines II
description: A deep city-building simulator that allows players to design, manage, and optimize cities with realistic traffic, economy, and environmental systems.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
description: A realistic truck driving simulator where players transport goods across Europe, upgrade vehicles, and manage their trucking business.

name: American Truck Simulator
description: A trucking simulation game that lets players drive across the U.S., delivering cargo, managing a trucking company, and exploring iconic landscapes.

name: SnowRunner
description: An extreme off-road trucking simulator where players navigate difficult terrain, complete contracts, and upgrade vehicles in a highly detailed physics engine.

name: Starfield
description: A space exploration RPG by Bethesda, offering deep character customization, ship building, and an expansive universe with over 1,000 planets to explore.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: A story-driven RPG based on Dungeons & Dragons rules, featuring rich character interactions, deep tactical combat, and player-driven narratives.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
description: An open-world RPG set in the Harry Potter universe, allowing players to attend Hogwarts, learn magic, and uncover hidden secrets in the wizarding world.

name: No Man's Sky
description: A massive procedurally-generated universe where players explore planets, mine resources, upgrade ships, and survive in a constantly evolving galaxy.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
description: An expansion for Cyberpunk 2077, introducing a spy-thriller storyline, improved mechanics, and new areas to explore in the dystopian world of Night City.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A deep RPG following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter navigating a rich, choice-driven world full of political intrigue and mythical creatures.

name: Monster Hunter: World
description: A co-op-focused action game where players hunt massive monsters, craft powerful gear, and master diverse weapons in large open environments.

name: Monster Hunter Rise
description: A faster-paced entry in the Monster Hunter series with new traversal mechanics and hunting styles, optimized for both solo and multiplayer experiences.

name: Palworld
description: A unique blend of survival mechanics and Pokémon-like creature collection, allowing players to battle, build, and explore a dangerous yet whimsical world.
